page.title: 21Our Dad as a Fireman
page.content:
Our names are Naomi & Louis Harvey; we are 19 and 7 years old. Our Dad has been a Fireman at Malmesbury Fire station for 9 years. We are proud that our Dad is a Fireman and helps others, however sometimes it is frustrating when he gets a fire shout and can be gone for hours at a time. Every September our Dad works very hard to put together the Emergency Services Show- which raises thousands of pounds for charity, at the same time as giving the public the chance to see what exactly the Emergency Services do.

In April 2008 our Dad received an award from the Queen because he helped to save somebody's life; this made us extremely proud of him. We do get worried about him being a fireman- but we know that he is doing it to help other people. Our younger sister thinks it is cool that our Dad is a fireman and likes to tell all her friends at school. It's exciting to see our Dad driving the fire engine in the carnival too.

Our Dad enjoys being a fireman as he has grown up in Malmesbury and feels he is giving something back to the community.


Contribution by: Naomi & Louis Harvey
